DOC.brief_summary: This non-randomized , single-group , multi-center , two phase study evaluate formula intolerance .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Stage 1 : Singleton full term birth birth weight > 2500g . Infant 0 60 day age . Discontinuation medication might affect gastrointestinal ( GI ) tolerance . Infant exclusively formulafed fulllactose , intact cow milk proteinbased infant formula ( CMF ) less 7 day prior enrollment . Inclusion Criteria Stage 2 : Infant feed accord protocol Stage 1 study . Infant identify fussy use Intolerance Assessment Tool Stage 1 . Exclusion Criteria Stage 1 : Chromosomal major congenital anomaly . Suspected known metabolic physical disease affect infant feed and/or metabolism . Hospitalization , delivery , prior enrollment . Severe uncontrolled eczema , visible bloody stool milk protein allergy prior enrollment . More 1 substitution infant formula fulllactose , intact cow milk formula ( CMF ) since birth . Use prokinetic drug within 7 day enrollment . Exclusion Criteria Stage 2 : Infant 's intolerance symptom cause another reason , example know infection/illness , food allergy , response vaccination ( ) . Infant immunization ( ) within 3 day enrollment Stage 2 .
